title: Risk Matrix: DM1 Prospective Data Collection Platform
subtitle: Three-Month Project Plan

risks.label:
FHIR/OMOP mapping
complexity
risks.description: Underestimating the complexity of mapping between study-specific variables, FHIR resources, and OMOP CDM, delaying research-ready datasets.
risks.mitigation: Prioritise a minimal, high-value variable subset for complete end-to-end mapping; plan subsequent phases to broaden coverage.

risks.label:
Suboptimal usability
for DM1 patients
risks.description: Poor usability for patients and caregivers reducing adherence or introducing systematic data quality issues.
risks.mitigation: Early and repeated usability testing with accessibility-focused design principles.

risks.label:
Slow governance
and legal reviews
risks.description: Governance and legal reviews proceeding more slowly than technical implementation, blocking deployment.
risks.mitigation: Start governance work in Month 1; maintain a clear review calendar; engage ethics and data protection stakeholders early.

risks.label:
Technical integration
of FOSS components
risks.description: Integration risks in combining Keycloak, PostgreSQL, FHIR libraries, OMOP tooling, and orchestration frameworks.
risks.mitigation: Early integration environment resembling production; incremental end-to-end testing throughout the timeline.
